title: Why i still don't get my S7 reward?

replies.body: There might have been something that could have disqualified you from getting those rewards, but I'd definitely reach out to the player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to find out for sure what happened!

Hit up Customer Support with a ticket and they should get around to giving you them rewards.
Unless you were banned/chat restricted in the 2 months leading up to the season end, then you forfeited your rewards as punishment.
